problem_statement: Implement a peer-to-peer credit settlement engine using React and Express. The system must handle multi-user 'Group Payments' where a single user pays for a group's expenses, requiring an atomic multi-row balance update to prevent double-spending or credit-ghosting.
FAIL_TO_PASS: TrustPay Group Settlement Engine > Edge: rejects non-integer or non-positive totalCents
TrustPay Group Settlement Engine > Edge: rejects empty participants and payer included in participants
TrustPay Group Settlement Engine > Edge: participant validation (non-existent or inactive) aborts the whole transaction
TrustPay Group Settlement Engine > Edge: duplicate participantIds do not double-credit (deduped) and split uses unique participants
TrustPay Group Settlement Engine > Edge: remainder split is deterministic and sums exactly to totalCents
TrustPay Group Settlement Engine > Requirement 6 (Partial Failure): simulated DB error halfway rolls back payer + participant balances
TrustPay Group Settlement Engine > Requirement 7 (Race Condition): two concurrent settlements, only one succeeds, payer never goes negative
TrustPay frontend (root tests/) > renders the wizard header after users load
